description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it uses the 'domify' function to directly insert user-controlled input into HTML. If an attacker can control the 'tab.id', 'tab.label', 'group.id', 'group.label', or 'entry.id' values, they could inject malicious scripts into the page, which would then be executed when the page is loaded.
